event.title: provide details of a primary school in Menge in 1968

data.event: Records at the Nordic Africa Institute website provide details of a primary school in Menge in 1968.

event.title: Based on figures from the Central Statistical Agency (CSA), in 2005

data.event: Based on figures from the Central Statistical Agency (CSA), in 2005 this town has an estimated total population of 318, of whom 176 were males and 142 were females.
The 1994 national census reported its total population was 185, of whom 102 were males and 83 were females.
